Html: I assume that the modeling for the new Meta gems is in progress.  Any ETA on when we might see them?
They are already in the new item cache, if you don't see them, reset your local item cache.

Stuuuuupid question time, sorry - didn't see this in the FAQ either: How do we reset our local item cache for silverlight. I right-clicked the app, chose Silverlight, went to application storage, told it to delete elitistjerks.com's storage, then hit F5 to reload Rawr completely. Was that the right thing to do?
That should work. You also have an option in the top menu to reset the cache.
